00022 #ifndef _VIRTEX_IO_H_
00023 #define _VIRTEX_IO_H_
00024 
00025 #define VIRTEX_MAGIC_NR 'o' //experimental, could produce conflicts with other ioctls (should be altered later).
00026 #define VIRTEX_READ_REG _IOWR(VIRTEX_MAGIC_NR, 1, unsigned long int)
00027 #define VIRTEX_WRITE_REG _IOWR(VIRTEX_MAGIC_NR, 2, unsigned long int)
00028 #define VIRTEX_SET_REG _IOWR(VIRTEX_MAGIC_NR, 3, unsigned long int)
00029 #define VIRTEX_READ_FRAMES _IOWR(VIRTEX_MAGIC_NR, 4, unsigned long int)
00030 #define VIRTEX_WRITE_WORD _IOWR(VIRTEX_MAGIC_NR, 5, unsigned long int)
00031 #define VIRTEX_READ_WORD _IOWR(VIRTEX_MAGIC_NR, 6, unsigned long int)
00032 
00033 extern struct file_operations virtex_fops;
00034 extern int bytes_written;
00035 
00036 /* header is used to store a header when writing to register and reading a frame */
00037 static unsigned long int header = 0;
00038 
00039 #endif /* _VIRTEX_IO_H */
